title: Iran’s killing of protesters reached level rarely seen, emergent count shows
summary_full: Even in the scale of global attacks on civilians and crackdowns on dissent, the magnitude of Iran’s violence against protesters stands out.
summary_public: Even in the scale of global attacks on civilians and crackdowns on dissent, the magnitude of Iran’s violence against protesters stands out.

IR.label: negative
IR.evidence: Iran’s killing of protesters reached level rarely seen
